name: CreateAlertTemplate
description:
Create a new alert or incident template.

Use this tool to create a new template in PagerDuty, which can be used for alerts or incidents. Requires OAuth with `templates.write` scope.

parameters.name: template_type
parameters.description: The type of template. Currently, only 'status_update' is supported.

value_schema.description: The type of template (`status_update` is the only supported template at this time)

parameters.name: template_name
parameters.description: The name for the new template to be created in PagerDuty.

parameters.name: template_description
parameters.description: Provide a brief description of the template, outlining its purpose and use case.

parameters.name: email_subject
parameters.description: The subject line for the email template, which will appear as the email's subject.

parameters.name: email_body_html
parameters.description: The HTML body content for the email message to be sent as part of the template.

value_schema.description: The HTML body of the e-mail message

parameters.name: short_message_template
parameters.description: The short message for the template, used in SMS, Push notifications, Slack, etc.

value_schema.description:
The short-message of the template (SMS, Push notification, Slack,
etc)
